data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Sabar Kantha.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sabar Kantha, Gujarat, India

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Sabar Kantha
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 26,715 believers in Sabar Kantha and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Sabar Kantha, Gujarat, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Valmiki, Balmiki (Hindu traditions) people. Make the Valmiki, Balmiki (Hindu traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Sabar Kantha, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Sabar Kantha that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sabar Kantha, Gujarat, India has a population of 2,428,600.

We estimate Sabar Kantha has 26,715 people who might know Jesus, 29,467 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,372,418 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 26,715 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Sabar Kantha.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

location.name: Sabar Kantha
